titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require the disclosure of certain information by persons conducting polls by telephone during campaigns for election for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1342)

bill.summary: 06/26/1997--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require the disclosure of specified information by certain persons conducting polls by telephone or electronic means during Federal election campaigns.
